details.Examination Details: NTA will be conducting JIPMAT- 2025 on 26t April, 2025 (Saturday) from 03:00 PM to 5:30 PM (Indian Standard Time).
details.Corrections Allowed: Candidate can make corrections in the particulars of their respective Application Forms up to 11:50 P.M. on 21 March 2025.
details.Additional Fee: Applicable if there is an impact on the fee amount.
